mapper.select: select p_price, p_name, p_pimg_name, p_info from product p where p_no = #{ pno } and p_delyn = 'N' and p_display = 'Y'

select p_no, p_price, p_name, p_pimg_name, (select sum(d_qty) from detail d where p_no = p.p_no) sum from product p where p_delyn = 'N' and p_display = 'Y'
and p_name like CONCAT('%', #{ keyword }, '%')
order by sum limit #{ offset }, 16
